name: UnderGrow's Holding Sun - Jukebox
description:
Play with the UnderGrow's song, Holding Sun, mixing all the instruments the way you like.

UnderGrow is a game made for Global Game Jam 2023 in Córdoba, Argentina.

Programming - Lua McBride

Game Design - Stuffed Wombat

2D Art - Mer Grazzini

Music and jukebox - by BruReale
